meanings.definition: Denoting an unspecified member in a series or sequence.
meanings.sent1: She picked the nth book from the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The nth student in line raised their hand.
meanings.sent3: The nth cookie in the jar mysteriously disappeared.
meanings.sent4: His patience was wearing thin, like the nth grain of sand slipping through an hourglass.
meanings.sent5: The nth star in the sky twinkled brightly.

meanings.definition: Denoting an unspecified degree or level.
meanings.sent1: He reached the nth level of the game.
meanings.sent2: The nth degree of heat made the room uncomfortable.
meanings.sent3: The nth cup of coffee had him bouncing off the walls.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement rose to the nth power as she opened the gift.
meanings.sent5: The nth layer of frosting on the cake was pure perfection.
